LanguageData.BlocksRimica.label: Rimica blocks
LanguageData.BlocksRimica.description: Blocks of Rimica composite laminate. A manufactured construction material that is heat resistant and has sterile properties.
LanguageData.BlocksFortRimica.label: Fortrimica blocks
LanguageData.BlocksFortRimica.description: Blocks of fortified Rimica composite laminate. A manufactured construction material that is heat resistant. This particular synthetic has been fortified with the use of Plasteel.
